resources.string: To use the maintenance mode please click here agree the
Before starting the repair mode, please ensure that the data has been backed up, and the after-sales service is not responsible for possible data loss caused by the repaired product.
Click here to go to exit Maintenance Mode
Maintenance mode creation failed, please try again later
The maximum number of users in the system has been reached, please delete the avatar, double open or child mode data and try again
Maintenance mode can only be created in the main user space
Starting repair mode, phone restarting soon …
Comprehensive protection of mobile phone data
Protect important private data such as photos, videos, contacts, call logs, and text messages during after-sales maintenance
To avoid data loss, it is recommended that you send it in for repair after
delete maintenance mode completed, for your performance of device, please reboot it
Turning on the maintenance mode will automatically restart the phone, please confirm whether it is turned on immediately
It is detected that the main user of the device has been unlocked. To protect user privacy and data security, it is recommended that you re-enter the maintenance mode

In order to ensure the security of your data, please set a lock screen password. The password cannot be retrieved, please remember it. When closing the maintenance mode, you need to verify the lock screen password you set.
